evidence.claim: Uses AWS services for cloud infrastructure, including Lambda and EC2.
Integration with EHRs via HL7 and FHIR protocols.
Supports X12 transaction sets for healthcare billing.
Event-driven architecture utilizing AWS SQS for message queuing.
Implementation of microservices for modular application development.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on EHR integration and X12 transactions indicates alignment with ICP criteria.
matched_use_cases: EHR integration with payers and providers
